IntroBlock.Title: ITalking & Social platform
IntroBlock.Content: In ITalking, you can show yourself through text, voice, and pictures, discover friends based on communication, and establish true, effective, and healthy social relationships.

IntroMiddleBlock.Title: Know me by voice
IntroMiddleBlock.Content: Enter the world of ITalking and meet those interesting people.

AboutBlock.Title: About ITalking
AboutBlock.Content: Communicate interesting stories with friends on the same platform and expand your network. Clash your thoughts and improve yourself.

FirstSelection.Title: Explore interesting moments
FirstSelection.Content: The boring life needs to be broken, and the wonderful moments need to be illuminated. Come explore and discover the bright and wonderful moments on ITalking.

SecondSelection.Title: Voice communication
SecondSelection.Content: Try to find a soul that is as good as you. Talk to him about his interests and passions with your voice, and friends will be by your side.

MissionBlock.Title: Improve the quality of social
MissionBlock.Content: Eric Klinenberg, a sociologist at New York University, believes that the quality of social interaction, not the quantity, determines whether you are alone. Although some people live alone and rarely see people, they still find satisfaction in a small amount of social interaction; ITalking's social mechanism will help you meet higher quality friends.

ProductBlock.Title: Follow the soul to find you
ProductBlock.Content: Soul growth needs to be slower, but in the current era of rapid change, it is slow and somewhat extravagant.

Footer.Question: Do you have any question regarding ITalking? Feel free to reach out.

Login.Title: Enter the world of ITalking
Login.Name: Your nickname
Login.Description: Using ITalking for the first time?
